message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60%, you get 40%.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for the first round.  I'm willing to be generous now, but time is money! Let's make a deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. Let's split it 52.5% for me, 47.5% for you.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is more than fair considering the time pressure. Take it or leave it - but don't expect me to be this generous again!
